about_the_game:
EXPERIMENT 01.ALPHA


This award winning 5-minute experiment multiplies your 2x2 meter tracking space several times over. We take a human being test subject (YOU) through a wondrous test environment using the power of REDIRECTION.

THE POWER OF REDIRECTED WALKING

You may or may not be asking: “What is REDIRECTION?”. I may or may not have read your mind with my answer: “A cutting edge locomotion technique that allows you to move and walk as freely as you would in reality…. in Virtual Reality.”

ONE SIMPLE TASK: TAKE REDDIE FROM A TO B

We have prepared a mind-altering experience that will demonstrate how we can extend a play space with no teleportation or stick movement. You will explore a space naturally and it is probable your mind will be blown open like a cantaloupe (metaphorically).





Enjoy yourself!

The Curvature Games Lab Team

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: Intel i3-6100/AMD Ryzen 3 1200, FX4350 or greater.
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970/AMD Radeon RX 470 or greater.
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
  • VR Support: Open XR, Requires Motion Controllers
